thread.title: BRIEF-Tigenix Says Received Transparency Notification From Jpmorgan Chase & Co​ On Jan 16

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tigenix Says Received Transparency Notification From Jpmorgan Chase & Co​ On Jan 16

organizations.name: brief-tigenix says received transparency notification from jpmorgan chase & co

text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Tigenix Nv:
* ‍TRANSPARENCY NOTIFICATION PURSUANT TO ARTICLE 14 OF LAW OF MAY 2, 2007​‍
* ON JANUARY 16, 2018, TIGENIX RECEIVED A TRANSPARENCY NOTIFICATION FROM JPMORGAN CHASE & CO​
* ‍FOLLOWING DISPOSAL OF VOTING SECURITIES ON JAN 9 JPMORGAN CHASE & CO HOLDS 1.2 MILLION VOTING RIGHTS IN CO ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
